complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Fix CDK SageMaker Stack Critical Issues
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Simple syntax fixes and configuration corrections in existing code. Well-defined issues with clear solutions. No subtask expansion needed as the fixes are straightforward.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create ECR Repository and Container Build Pipeline
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down this task into: 1) ECR repository creation and configuration, 2) Docker image building and tagging process, 3) Image push automation and versioning, 4) CDK stack integration with ECR URI references
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving multiple AWS services and automation. Requires coordination between infrastructure and container management. Benefits from breaking into logical components.
Already well-decomposed with 4 subtasks. Involves security configuration, IAM permissions, code modifications, and performance optimization. Moderate to high complexity due to security implications.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Enhance CDK Stack with Security and Monitoring
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Already well-decomposed with 6 subtasks. High complexity involving networking, security, monitoring, and compliance. Multiple AWS services integration with interdependencies.
Already well-decomposed with 6 subtasks. High complexity involving SageMaker deployment, configuration, and testing. Critical for system functionality with multiple integration points.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Deployment Scripts and Environment Configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Main deployment script creation with CDK integration, 2) Environment-specific configuration files and parameter management, 3) Rollback and recovery script implementation, 4) Pre-deployment validation and dependency checking, 5) Documentation and troubleshooting guide creation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity involving automation, environment management, and operational procedures. Multiple components that benefit from separate development and testing.
Already well-decomposed with 7 subtasks. High complexity involving multiple testing types, performance validation, and comprehensive coverage. Critical for production readiness.
Already well-decomposed with 7 subtasks. Very high complexity involving production-grade security, compliance, disaster recovery, and cost management. Mission-critical with extensive requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) n8n integration setup and configuration, 2) Complete workflow testing and validation, 3) Performance and latency requirement verification, 4) Error handling and resilience testing, 5) Production monitoring and documentation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving end-to-end system validation, performance testing, and production readiness verification. Multiple integration points requiring systematic testing approach.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Technical documentation creation (deployment, API, architecture), 2) Operational procedures and runbooks, 3) Monitoring and troubleshooting guides, 4) Training materials and knowledge transfer sessions
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity requiring comprehensive documentation across multiple domains. Important for operational success but primarily involves knowledge capture and organization.
